data.name: Kapital: Sparks of Revolution Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: A post-war city rises from the ashes to become a shining beacon, but its peaceful symphony will not last long… Its struggles and internal conflicts will bring their own tones.
data.about_the_game: A post-war city rises from the ashes to become a shining beacon, but its peaceful symphony will not last long… Its struggles and internal conflicts will bring their own tones.
data.short_description: Official soundtrack for the game Kapital: Sparks of Revolution

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 254 MB available space
